BLUB.focus: <circle transform="translate(@@X@@,@@Y@@)" cx="-1.8" cy="2" r="29" stroke-width="0" fill="#0099cc" stroke="#CCFFFF"/>
<circle transform="translate(@@X@@,@@Y@@)" cx="-0.8" cy="0" r="19" stroke-width="0" fill="#0099cc" stroke="#CCFFFF"/>

SPROING.svg: <line fill="none" x1="@@X1@@" y1="@@Y1@@" x2="@@X2@@" y2="@@Y2@@" stroke="#CCFFFF" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="12 4"/>
<line fill="none" x1="@@X1@@" y1="@@Y1@@" x2="@@X2@@" y2="@@Y2@@" stroke="#FFFFCC" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="12 4"/>

<line fill="none" x1="@@X1@@" y1="@@Y1@@" x2="@@X2@@" y2="@@Y2@@" stroke="#CCFFFF" stroke-width="1"/><circle stroke="#FFFFFF" cx="@@XC@@" xy="@@cy@@" stroke-width="1.8" r="4.2" fill="#33CC99" onclick="getCod(evt,'@@FROMID@@','@@TOID@@','@@img@@')"/>

PANEL.svg: <g><g id="panel@@PANELCOUNT@@" onmousedown="bringTop('panel@@PANELCOUNT@@')" transform="translate(@@CODX@@,@@CODY@@)"><g transform="scale(@@SCALE@@)"><rect fill="#0099cc" stroke="#CCFFFF" stroke-width="1" x="0" y="0" width="210" height="190"/><g transform="translate(5,5)" onmousedown="draggingPanel='panel@@PANELCOUNT@@';bringTop('panel@@PANELCOUNT@@');draggingPanels=true" onmouseup="draggingPanel=null;draggingPanels=false" onmousemove="dragBlub(evt)"><rect fill="#F5F8CA" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" x="0" y="0" width="200" height="24"/><text x="0.2em" y="1.17em" font-weight="bold" font-family="Osaka,MS Arial Unicode" font-size="14.5" letter-spacing="0.525" pointer-events="none">@@NICKFROM@@/@@NICKTO@@</text></g><g transform="translate(5,35)"><rect fill="#CCCCCC" stroke="#CCCCCC" stroke-width="4" x="0" y="0" width="200" height="150"/><image xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="@@IMG@@" x="0" y="0" height="150" width="200"/></g><g onclick="closePanel('panel@@PANELCOUNT@@')" transform="translate(185,9)"><path fill="#FF0033" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.9246" d="M15.192,10.15 c0,2.784-2.257,5.041-5.041,5.041H5.503c-2.784,0-5.041-2.257-5.041-5.041V5.502c0-2.784,2.257-5.041,5.041-5.041h4.648 c2.784,0,5.041,2.257,5.041,5.041V10.15z" /><path d="M12.355,11.611l-1.247,1.247L2.731,4.482l1.248-1.247L12.355,11.611z" /><path d="M3.979,12.858l-1.248-1.247l8.376-8.376l1.248,1.247L3.979,12.858z" /></g></g></g>

<g><text transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 10.9155 68.9502)"><tspan x="0" y="0" font-family="Osaka,MS Arial Unicode" font-size="12">@@NICK@@</tspan></text><text transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 10.5573 94.7222)"><tspan x="0" y="0" font-family="Osaka,MS Arial Unicode" font-size="10">@@NAME@@</tspan></text>
@@MBOX1@@@@MBOX2@@@@MBOX3@@
